仏文科: (ふつぶんか) - department of French literature
仏様: (ほとけさま) - a Buddha; deceased person
仏法僧: (ぶっぽうそう) - Buddha, Dharma, Sangha (the Buddha, the teachings, and the spiritual community); dollarbird (Eurystomus orientalis); roller (any bird of family Coraciidae); Eurasian scops owl (Otus scops)
仏泥鰌: (ホトケドジョウ) - Japanese eight-barbel loach (Lefua echigonia)
仏涅槃: (ぶつねはん) - the death of Shakyamuni Buddha; Buddhist service held on the day of Buddha's death (orig. 15th of the 2nd month, now 15th of the 3rd month)
仏涅槃忌: (ぶつねはんき) - Buddhist service held on the day of Buddha's death (orig. 15th of the 2nd month, now 15th of the 3rd month)
仏滅: (ぶつめつ) - Buddha's death; very unlucky day (according to old almanacs)
仏滅日: (ぶつめつにち) - very unlucky day (according to old almanacs)
仏牙: (ぶつげ) - tooth of Buddha recovered from his cremated ashes
仏生会: (ぶっしょうえ) - Buddha's birthday celebration
仏界: (ぶっかい) - Pure Land; spiritual realm of Buddhahood
仏種: (ぶっしゅ) - seed of Buddhahood; something that makes it possible to attain Buddhahood; teaching of Buddha which make it possible to be enlightened
仏罰: (ぶつばつ) - punishment by Buddha; divine retribution
仏花: (ぶつばな) - flowers or flower arrangements for a butsudan (household Buddhist altar)
仏詣: (ぶっけい) - act of visiting a Shinto shrine or Buddhist temple
仏足石: (ぶっそくせき) - footprint of the Buddha carved in stone
仏足石の歌: (ぶっそくせきのうた) - poems inscribed beside the stone Buddha Foot monument at Yakushi Temple in Nara
仏足石歌: (ぶっそくせきか) - poems inscribed beside the stone Buddha Foot monument at Yakushi Temple in Nara
仏足石歌体: (ぶっそくせきかたい) - form of poetry found on the stone Buddha Foot monument at Yakushi Temple in Nara (following a 5-7-5-7-7-7 moraic pattern)
仏跡: (ぶっせき) - place sacred to Buddhism
仏身: (ぶっしん) - buddhakaya (the body of Buddha)
仏間: (ぶつま) - Buddhist family chapel; altar room
仏頂: (ぶっちょう) - crown of a buddha's head; brusqueness/grumpiness
仏頂尊勝: (ぶちょうそんしょう) - Usnisavijaya; Victorious Goddess of the Chignon
仏領: (ふつりょう) - French possession; French territory
仏領ギアナ: (ふつりょうギアナ) - French Guiana
仏馬力: (ふつばりき) - French horse-power; metric horsepower
仔細ありげ: (しさいありげ) - seeming to be for a certain reason; seeming to indicate there are special circumstances; seeming to indicate there is more than meets the eye
仔細に及ばず: (しさいにおよばず) - there is no problem; there is no need to go into details
仔鳩: (こばと) - squab/young pigeon; (esp. 仔鳩) pigeon meat
仕える: (つかえる) - to serve; to work for; to attend
仕え奉る: (つかえまつる) - to serve; to build as commanded
仕かける: (しかける) - to start/to begin/to commence; to challenge/to pick (a fight)/to make (war); to set (traps)/to plant (explosives)/to lay (mines)
仕なおす: (しなおす) - to do over; to remake; to resume
仕る: (つかまつる) - to serve; to do
仕上: (しあげ) - end; finishing touches; being finished
仕上がる: (しあがる) - to be finished; to be completed; to be done
仕上げ: (しあげ) - end; finishing touches; being finished
仕上げる: (しあげる) - to finish up; to complete; to finish off; to get through; to polish off
仕上げ工: (しあげこう) - finishing workman; finisher; fitter
仕上る: (しあがる) - to be finished; to be completed; to be done
仕上工: (しあげこう) - finishing workman; finisher; fitter
仕事: (shigoto) - trabalho, emprego, negócio, ocupação, emprego, vocação, tarefa; trabalho
仕事で忙しい: (しごとでいそがしい) - busy with one's work
仕事にかかる: (しごとにかかる) - to get to work
仕事に勤しむ: (しごとにいそしむ) - to be assiduous in one's business
仕事に堪える: (しごとにたえる) - to be fit for work
仕事に応募する: (しごとにおうぼする) - to apply for a job; to apply for work
仕事に掛かる: (しごとにかかる) - to get to work
仕事の虫: (しごとのむし) - workaholic; person who is totally devoted to his work
仕事の鬼: (しごとのおに) - work fiend; devil for work
仕事ぶり: (しごとぶり) - the way one works
仕事をやめる: (しごとをやめる) - to quit one's job; to resign
